title: Parameter - CSS (Tag Content)
description: The parameter is echoed as the only content of a STYLE tag positioned into the HEAD.
body:
CSS Injection (Full Tag)

The input becomes the entire content of the style tag. Try executing XSS.

Param: ?q=

Target Element
objectives: Break out of the <style> tag using </style>.
Inject a <script> tag to execute alert(1).
Change the page background color via CSS rules.
hints: Since you control the whole tag content, try closing it first.
Valid CSS is not required if you break the tag.
